title: Song - the "wings and spurs" are best understood

content.question: The “wings and spurs” mentioned in line 16 are best understood to represent

choices.label: the speaker’s desires to allay his anxieties about death
desire for the beloved that the speaker carries with him
jokes by the speaker regarding his own mortality
the beloved’s apprehensions about the faithfulness of the speaker

content.answer: desire for the beloved that the speaker carries with him

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
